channel.title: Sonic360 Podcasts
channel.itunes:subtitle: Podcast from genre-bending record label Sonic360
channel.itunes:author: Sonic360
channel.itunes:summary: Multi-Grammy nominated artist Kinky kicks off the first in a series of Sonic360 podcasts, talking about their forthcoming and limited edition album 'Rarities'.Record producer, Chris Allison whose credits include work with The Beta Band, Dot Allison, Coldplay, Kinky and Plastilina Mosh, launched Sonic360 in June of 2000.Sonic360 artists include Acida, Almeida Girl and Descarga, Bn Loco, Chabz and Krizo, Fussible, Gladkazuka, Granufunk, Kayip, Kinky, Littl Shyning Man, Panorama, Pea Green Boat and Tammy.As diverse as the name suggests these artists come from Argentina, Colombia, Germany, Hungary, Mexico, South Korea and the UK. Always a pioneer at heart Sonic360 started one of the first 'Download Only' labels on the planet. Sonic360's 2 party nights are La Leche in the US and Head+Arm in the UK

item.title: Kinky Podcast
item.itunes:subtitle: Exclusive interview and rare gems from Kinky
item.description: Exclusive interview and rare gems from Kinky
